module.name: Dashboards
module.author: Core
module.description: Securely connect to services like Microsoft PowerBI and display dashboards

property.title: Link
property.helpText: The Location (URL) of the dashboard webpage

property.title: Update Interval (mins)
property.helpText: Please enter the update interval in minutes. This should be kept as high as possible. For example, if the data will only change once per hour this could be set to 60.

stencil.twig:
<style>
                #loader {
                    display: block;
                    margin-left: auto;
                    margin-right: auto;
                    margin-top: 50px;
                }
                #dashboard {
                    position: fixed;
                    top: 0;
                    left: 0;
                    width: 100%;
                    height: 100%;
                }
                #dashboard img {
                    margin: auto;
                    width: 100%;
                    height: 100%;
                }
                .error-message {
                    position: absolute;
                    bottom: 0;
                    left: 0;
                    text-align: center;
                    width: 100%;
                    padding: 8px 0;
                    background-color: #d05454;
                    color: white;
                    z-index: 2;
                    font-weight: bold;
                    font-size: 0.625rem;
                    opacity: 0.85;
                }
            </style>
